Hey, I Got A Problem. I Got The Game Fast, installed it. but when i run AWP or ED, it says: 

Ran out of virtual memory. To prevent this condition, you must free up more space on your primary hard disk.

 I have cleared space and it got up to 300mb (my computers old) but still wont work. and also, when i run Postal2 Share The Pain, It comes up with a windows batch file, then dissapears. nothing else. anyhelp would be highly apprieciated as this game is amazing. thx :)
Thannksss!
Why do you compress an ISO it doesn't save up any space it just makes the installation longer.
Hmm nevermind. my bad.
Something to play until Postal 3 is released. Thanks for the great torrent :D
Also @KillerBunniezz: 300MB isnt enough space, you need at least 8Gigabytes or so... you will also need at least a 32Megabyte graphics card (16 works too, ive tried it,) and a 750MHz processor.

Also : 300MB isnt enough space, you need at least 8Gigabytes or so... you will also need at least a 32Megabyte graphics card (16 works too, ive tried it,) and a 750MHz processor. 
@jonathanmadison12  and  @KillerBunniezz

Pick up a 500gb HDD from Ebay for $30
Get a 1GB Graphics card for another $30
Upgrade your processor for less than $10
Get 2gb+ of RAM for under $30
A good motherboard costs $40-$80
Power supply is $20-$40
DVD/BluRay drives are cheap as well.

Anything less than 2gb RAM and a 512mb Graphics Card is just junk, and it's time to upgrade.  I recommend a 2gb Graphics Card, atleast 4gb RAM, and atleast a 2.6ghz duo core processor.
